title: At Creation's End Hub
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:the-foundation-theme |dark=--]]]

[[module CSS]]
:root { --header-h1-font-size: calc(var(--base-font-size) * (40 / 11));
--header-title: "At Creation's End Hub";
}
#extra-div-3 {
background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/cotsk-hub/cotsk.png);
background-size: contain;
background-repeat: no-repeat
}
#header {
    --swatch-headerh1-color:150,00,00 ;
}
#page-content a:not([href*="user"]):not([href*="javascript:;"]):not([href="/classification-committee-memo"]) {
    color: #FFFFFF;
}
[[/module]]
>
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
-----
= //There was a time when there was nothing. Nothing but a Great Abyss//
= //And then came the Tree of Knowledge//
= //So was the Great Abyss fragmented, and so were the Gods born//
= //But the fragments did not fade. They broke the veil between is and is not//
= //This corruption was found by a young God, a King Ordained in Scarlet//
= //And now, here we stand, At Creation's End//
-----
++ **Tales**
> 
[[=]]
[[[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/at-creation-s-end | At Creation's End]]]
[[/=]]
There was once a God known as the King Ordained in Scarlet. And then he found the fragments of the Great Abyss left over from the Tree of Knowledge being planted. This is what happened. 
[[=]]
[[[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/metal-and-hellfire | Metal and Hellfire]]]
[[/=]]
The forges of creation are lit for the first time since Creation inception, while the Scarlet King whittles away at Hell itself. There is going to be blood. 
[[=]]
[[[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-darkness-after | The Darkness After]]]
[[/=]]
The Darkness Above. The Darkness Below. The Darkness Between. This is the Darkness After. 
[[include :scp-wiki:component:license-box]]

author: FreezerMonkey
